original_title: FLOSS Weekly Episode 793: Keeping an Eye on Things with Hilight.io
original_content:
This week Jonathan Bennett and Aaron Newcomb chat with Jay Khatri, the co-founder of Highlight.io. Thats a web application monitoring tool that can help you troubleshoot performance problems, find bugs, and improve experiences for anything that runs in a browser or browser-like environment. Why did they opt to make this tool Open Source? Whats the funding model? And whats the surprising challenge we tried to help Jay solve, live on the show? Listen to find out!


Did you know you can watch the live recording of the show Right on our YouTube Channel? Have someone youd like us to interview? Let us know, or contact the guest and have them contact us! Take a look at the schedule here.

Direct Download in DRM-free MP3.
If youd rather read along, heres the transcript for this weeks episode.

title: 「Highlight.io: オープンソースのWebアプリケーションモニタリングツール」
body: Highlight.ioの共同創設者であるJay Khatriが、Webアプリケーション監視ツールについて話す。「Open Sourceにした理由は？資金モデルは？衝撃的な課題は？」ライブで解決しよう。YouTubeでライブ録音も可能。
titles: 「Highlight.io: オープンソースのWebアプリケーションモニタリングツール」
「FLOSS Weekly Podcast: ハードウェアとソフトウェアの知識を活かす」
「YouTubeチャンネルでライブ録音が視聴可能」
